Pot</li> </ul> </li> <li>Does not need EVA build: <ul> <li>Slot 5: Supreme Sunscreen 🠆 Very Hot Pot</li> </ul> </li> </ul> </li> </ul> </div> <div class="column-layout"> <h3 id="sweet-dreams-packimpacktsjuly2023bsweet-dreams"><a href="/impackts/july2023b/sweet-dreams">Sweet Dreams Pack</a></h3> <ul> <li><strong>Trickster</strong> <ul> <li>Needs EVA build: <ul> <li>Slot 1: Primarosa 🠆 Somnus Boltcaster</li> </ul> </li> <li>Does not need EVA build: <ul> <li>Slot 1: Primarosa 🠆 Somnus Boltcaster</li> <li>Slot 2: Desperado Outfit 🠆 Garbs of Morpheus</li> </ul> </li> </ul> </li> <li><strong>Wanderer/Pathfinder</strong>: <ul> <li>Slot 5: Slide Grease 🠆 Sandman&rsquo;s Pouch</li> </ul> </li> <li><strong>Dancer/Acrobat</strong> <ul> <li>Note: If your hero rolled Marksman use <del>Primarosa</del> 🠆 Somnus Boltcaster</li> <li>Does not need EVA build: <ul> <li>Slot 2: Desperado Outfit 🠆 Garbs of Morpheus</li> </ul> </li> </ul> </li> <li><strong>Arch Druid</strong>: <ul> <li>Note: Use 2x Slide Grease for more survivability, or 2x Sandman&rsquo;s Pouch for more ATK</li> <li>Slot 4: Pot of Paella 🠆 Sandman&rsquo;s Pouch</li> </ul> </li> </ul> </div> </div>

contents:
The builds on this page have been removed.
The Hypermax / Dragon Invasion builds have proven to be confusing, controversial, and misleading.
The STC team has decided that it is best to remove these builds to help prevent further confusion. Specifically, the misconception that star power has anything to do with a good hero.
For information on balanced heroes, please refer to the BiS heroes page or the tl;dr page.
For advice on individual heroes, or your entire roster, join the STC Discord, and let us know. We are happy to help!
title: Dragon Invasion Heroes
